alert.note: Alert for Lancaster; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 5:16PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL LANCASTER AND SOUTHEASTERN YORK COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM EDT... At 516 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles south of Willow Street to 16 miles northwest of Aberdeen. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Delta, Wakefield, Susquehanna Trails, Fawn Grove, Little Britain and Peach Bottom. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for south central Pennsylvania.
